title: 3115 burn hole
message: have a 3115 with a burn hole under what was f9700. Restored 3v42 to fuse. Burn hole however is puffing smoke when I plug it in and no fan. I've had bad luck with burn holes. Any suggestions? Or junk?

title: 3115 burn hole
message: You can try scraping away at the hole in the hope the short disappears, however its usually a fruitless exercise. I just trash the board when this occurs.

title: 3115 burn hole
message: Seems to be in a spot that will have lots of traces nearby, probably junk.
